sentences.sContent: A love of junk food, television and computer games has sent the country's waistline ballooning, with Australians weighing in as the world's second fattest nation after the United States.
sentences.sContent_eng: A love of junk food, television and computer games has sent the country's waistline ballooning, with Australians weighing in as the world's second fattest nation after the United States.
sentences.sCn: 对垃圾食品、电视和电脑游戏的爱好使这个国家的腰围像气球一般鼓胀起来，澳洲人已经成了仅次于美国人的世界第二肥胖民族。

phrases.pCn: [外科学]气囊血管成形术；球囊成形术（等于percutaneous transluminal angioplasty）
毫无效果，毫无作用(意指如铅气球无法飞升)

words.tran: 使像气球般鼓起；使激增
